summary: The module defines a serializer class that converts unsigned integers (up to 256 bits) to and from the format required by Cairo contracts. It accepts plain integers or dictionary forms, splits values into low/high 128â€‘bit parts when needed, and integrates with the surrounding serialization context for both encoding and decoding.
business_intent: Enable accurate and efficient handling of large unsigned integers in StarkNet/Cairo data exchange, ensuring proper range validation and compatibility with contract interfaces.
